程序包 reactor.adapter

Adapt Publisher to Java 9+ Flow.Publisher.

请参阅: 说明

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    JdkFlowAdapter
    Convert a Java 9+ Flow.Publisher to/from a Reactive Streams Publisher.

程序包reactor.adapter的说明

Adapt Publisher to Java 9+ Flow.Publisher. More adapter can be found under http://github.com/reactor/reactor-addons/reactor-adapter including RxJava1 and RxJava2.
